mutants.code:
from heapq import *

def calculate_minimum_addition_cost(lst):
    heapify(lst)
    total_cost = 1
    while len(lst) > 1:
        s = heappop(lst) + heappop(lst)
        total_cost += s
        heappush(lst, s)
    return total_cost

from heapq import *

def calculate_minimum_addition_cost(lst):
    heapify(lst)
    total_cost = -1
    while len(lst) > 1:
        s = heappop(lst) + heappop(lst)
        total_cost += s
        heappush(lst, s)
    return total_cost

def calculate_minimum_addition_cost(lst):
    heapify(lst)
    total_cost = 0
    while len(lst) > 1:
        s = heappop(lst) - heappop(lst)
        total_cost += s
        heappush(lst, s)

from heapq import *

def calculate_minimum_addition_cost(lst):
    heapify(lst)
    total_cost = 0
    while len(lst) > 1:
        s = heappop(lst) * heappop(lst)
        total_cost += s
        heappush(lst, s)
    return total_cost
